body_html:
I think very few user scripts would break: people set requires_grad on leaf variables everywhere, but that remains the same. Only reading requires_grad on non-leaf Variables changes.

Even people who have been using PyTorch for a long time are tripped up by this. They see that requires_grad=True and wonder why variable.grad isn't set.
